description:
June 22, 2017 / Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Justine Barron, as well as guest panelists Jill Carter and Stephen Janis.

Thank you to our sponsor, Audible!
Get a free audiobook with a 30 day trial at www.audible.com/undisclosed. 

Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.
